languages.text: "Маршал, оставьте нас на минуту. Хочу объяснить Вольному Торговцу в каком {mf|он|она} положении".
"Excuse us for a moment, Marshal. I would like to explain to the Rogue Trader the position {mf|he|she} is in."
languages.original_text: "Маршал, оставьте нас на минуту. Хочу объяснить Вольному Торговцу в каком {mf|он|она} положении".

traits.locale_text: "Marshal, excuse us for a moment. I would like to explain to the Rogue Trader the position {mf|he|she} is in."
"Excuse us for a moment, Marshal. I would like to explain to the Rogue Trader the position {mf|he|she} is in."
"Excuse us for a moment, Marshal. I would like to explain to the Rogue Trader the position {mf|he|she} is in."
"Excuse us for a moment, Marshal. I would like to explain to the Rogue Trader the position {mf|he|she} is in."
"Excuse us for a moment, Marshal. I would like to explain to the Rogue Trader the position {mf|he|she} is in."

languages.text: "Entschuldigt uns einen Augenblick, Marschall. Ich möchte {mf|{mf|dem Freihändler seine|der Freihändlerin ihre} Situation erklären."
languages.original_text: "Excuse us for a moment, Marshal. I would like to explain to the Rogue Trader the position {mf|he|she} is in."

traits.locale_text: "Entschuldigt uns einen Augenblick, Marschall. Ich möchte {mf|{mf|dem Freihändler seine|der Freihändlerin ihre} Situation erklären."

languages.text: « Veuillez nous excuser un instant, maréchal. J'aimerais expliquer {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} dans quelle position {mf|il|elle} se trouve. »
languages.original_text: "Excuse us for a moment, Marshal. I would like to explain to the Rogue Trader the position {mf|he|she} is in."

traits.locale_text: « Veuillez nous excuser un instant, maréchal. J'aimerais expliquer {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} dans quelle position {mf|il|elle} se trouve. »

languages.text: “失陪一下，元帅，我需要向行商浪人解释一下{mf|他|她}当下的处境。”
languages.original_text: "Excuse us for a moment, Marshal. I would like to explain to the Rogue Trader the position {mf|he|she} is in."

traits.locale_text: “失陪一下，元帅，我需要向行商浪人解释一下{mf|他|她}当下的处境。”

languages.text: «Discúlpenos un momento, Mariscal. Me gustaría explicarle a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente la situación en la que se encuentra».
languages.original_text: "Excuse us for a moment, Marshal. I would like to explain to the Rogue Trader the position {mf|he|she} is in."

traits.locale_text: «Discúlpenos un momento, Mariscal. Me gustaría explicarle a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente la situación en la que se encuentra».

languages.text: 「将帥、少々失礼いたします。ローグトレーダーに、ご自身の立場について説明させていただきたいのです」
languages.original_text: "Excuse us for a moment, Marshal. I would like to explain to the Rogue Trader the position {mf|he|she} is in."

traits.locale_text: 「将帥、少々失礼いたします。ローグトレーダーに、ご自身の立場について説明させていただきたいのです」

languages.text: "Bir dakikanızı bağışlayın Miralay. Hür Tacir'in içinde bulunduğu durumu kendisine izah etmek isterim."
languages.original_text: "Excuse us for a moment, Marshal. I would like to explain to the Rogue Trader the position {mf|he|she} is in."

traits.locale_text: "Bir dakikanızı bağışlayın Miralay. Hür Tacir'in içinde bulunduğu durumu kendisine izah etmek isterim."
